description:
Course Description

Ever wanted to write a screenplay? Ever seen a movie at your local cineplex and thought: "Geez, I can write better than that junk?"

Not sure how to get started or the best way to transform your story ideas into an actual full-length screenplay?

Well...worry no longer!

Instead take a chance with the Movie Idea Creator course and learn how to unearth a kick-ass movie idea in 7 days or less.

What We'll Cover

In Movie Idea Creator here's what we're going to go over:

Day 1: What Every Story is Really, Really, Really About

Day 2: 3 Steps to Movie Idea Awesomeness

Day 3: Movie Idea Brainstorming on Steroids

Day 4: How to Find a Non-Sucky Hero

Day 5: Zen and the Art of the Perfect Bad Guy

Day 6: Story Structure in 7 Simple Steps

Day 7: The Final Keys to Story Structure Awesomeness

Day 8: (Secret Bonus Awesomeness)

How We'll Do It

And instead of going over it in some BORING lecture format - I'm actually going to walk you through the process, exercise by exercise, with a movie idea of my own. (How's that for interactive?)

So...if you'd like to take a chance on your creativity - no matter what your storytelling ability - give Movie Idea Creator a chance. (We'll be waiting for ya!)

About Me

Michael Rogan is a former Hollywood screenplay reader and optioned screenwriter. He is the founder and editor of ScriptBully magazine, an inbox periodical devoted to helping screenwriters master get noticed, get paid..and achieve the career of their dreams.
title: Screenwriting 101 | Your 7-Day Guide to a Killer Movie Idea
